import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-edit', templateUrl: './add-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-edit.component.css'] }) export class AddEditComponent { id: string; constructor(private Activatedroute: ActivatedRoute, private router:Router) { this.id = this.Activatedroute.snapshot.queryParamMap.get('id') || ""; } }
